title: MANETmesh - Home
description: MANETmesh Technologies - Leading manufacturer of professional wireless MESH networks and data link solutions. MANET mesh (Mobile Ad-hoc Network mesh) technology offers distributed, centerless, self-organizing ad-hoc networks with dynamic routing, multi-hop relay, HD video transmission up to 350 Mbps and 500+ km range. Ideal for military communications, emergency response, public safety, and critical infrastructure applications.
welcome: Welcome to MANETmesh - Leading Mobile Mesh Network Solutions

wireless_mesh.title: MANETmesh Wireless MESH
wireless_mesh.subtitle: Distributed centerless IP Mesh from star, line to mesh network
wireless_mesh.description: Wireless broadband ad hoc networks with decentralized, distributed, self-organizing, adaptive, and self-healing mesh network featuring dynamic routing and multi-hop relaying.
features: Real-time HD video, multi-channel data, and high-fidelity voice
Up to 350 Mbps throughput and 500+ km transmission range
Multi-carrier OFDM modulation and smart antenna MIMO

applications.title: Applications
applications.fire_rescue: Fire command and forest fire prevention
applications.power_inspection: Power inspection and digital oil fields

company.name: MANETmesh Technologies
company.tagline: Performance / Wireless / Professional - The best choice for long-distance, high-speed and anti-interference wireless data transmission
